issue.title: [Dev][Archery] Use a more recent cmake-format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8459](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8459). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reading through the cmake-format releases page it seems to contain improvements.

Additionally we should check cmake-format's version in run-cmake-format.py to have unified behaviour both locally and on the CI.
